com.ami.mse.ucms.db.manager.tasks

Interface TaskManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskManagerImp

    public interface TaskManager
    Contains methods that processing instance of Assignment using EntityManager. There are methods for save and update new or existing instance. Also there are method for extraction existing record of assignment from the data base.
    Author:
    Tony

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Assignment> findAll()
      Find all records of Assignment that are in the data base.
      List<Assignment> findAllAssignByMe(User assignor)
      Find all tasks assign by the logged user.
      List<Assignment> findAllAssignToMe(User executer)
      Find all tasks assign to the logged user.
      List<Assignment> findAllByExpiredData(Timestamp date)
      Find all Assignment which are with expired date
      List<Assignment> findAllByStartDate(Timestamp date)
      Find all Assignment by property start date.
      List<Assignment> findAllWithPriority(AssignmentPriority priority)
      Find all Assignment with given priority.
      List<Assignment> findAllWithStatus(AssignmentStatus status)
      Find all with status.
      List<Assignment> findByAssignor(User user)
      Find all records of Assignment for given property assignor.
      List<Assignment> findByExecuter(User user)
      Find all records of Assignment for given property executer.
      Assignment findById(int id)
      Find instance of Assignment by it id.
      void save(Assignment assignment)
      Saves instance of Assignment in the data base.
      Assignment update(Assignment assignment)
      Update instance of Assignment or saves the instance if it's not exist in the data base.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(Assignment assignment)
        Saves instance of Assignment in the data base.
        Parameters:
        assignment - the assignment that will be saved in the data base

      • update

        Assignment update(Assignment assignment)
        Update instance of Assignment or saves the instance if it's not exist in the data base.
        Parameters:
        assignment - the assignment that will be updated or saved

      • findById

        Assignment findById(int id)
        Find instance of Assignment by it id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the searched assignment
        Returns:
        the record of assignment or null if it do not exist in the data base

      • findAll

        List<Assignment> findAll()
        Find all records of Assignment that are in the data base.
        Returns:
        the list of all records of assignment or empty list if there is none record in the data base

      • findByAssignor

        List<Assignment> findByAssignor(User user)
        Find all records of Assignment for given property assignor.
        Parameters:
        user - the user for who will be searched assignments
        Returns:
        the list of assignments for that user if or empty list if there is none assignments

      • findByExecuter

        List<Assignment> findByExecuter(User user)
        Find all records of Assignment for given property executer.
        Parameters:
        user - the user for who will be searched assignments
        Returns:
        the list of assignments for that user if or empty list if there is none assignments

      • findAllByStartDate

        List<Assignment> findAllByStartDate(Timestamp date)
        Find all Assignment by property start date.
        Parameters:
        date - the date on which it will search assignments
        Returns:
        the list of found assignments or empty list if there is none assignments with given date

      • findAllByExpiredData

        List<Assignment> findAllByExpiredData(Timestamp date)
        Find all Assignment which are with expired date
        Parameters:
        date - the date with which is searched
        Returns:
        the list of assignments that are with expired date

      • findAllWithStatus

        List<Assignment> findAllWithStatus(AssignmentStatus status)
        Find all with status. Find all Assignment with given status.
        Parameters:
        status - the status on which it will search assignments
        Returns:
        the list found assignments or empty list if there is none assignments with given status

      • findAllWithPriority

        List<Assignment> findAllWithPriority(AssignmentPriority priority)
        Find all Assignment with given priority.
        Parameters:
        priority - the priority on which it will search assignments
        Returns:
        the list found assignments or empty list if there is none assignments with given priority

        Find all tasks assign to the logged user.

        Returns:
        the list of assignments for the given user or empty list if there is none assignments
